global.pmallow:

global.pmblock:
❌ Ninne Nirodhichu*

 Personal ayi message ayakkunnavare ith nirodhichirikkunnu.
global.pmwarn:
✋Hii*

global.permited:
Hii ${tname} Sir*

Now You are permitted by my owner to pm now.

 *Powered by Secktor
global.revoked:
*Hii ${tname} Sir*

Your pm permit permission has been prevoked now.

 _Powered by Secktor_
